function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread to medical staff and patients","Mitigation":"Proper collection, storage, decay, and disinfection of hospital waste and wastewater","Technologies":"Special containers, disinfection methods","People":"Medical staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Uncertainty in effective disinfection methods","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies to understand effective inactivation methods","Technologies":"Research and testing facilities","People":"Research scientists, healthcare institutions","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"}]}
